# Schedule

```{r, echo = FALSE}
dates <- seq(from = as.Date("2021-01-12"),
             to = as.Date("2021-05-31"), by = 7)
topics <- c("Introduction: Mind Over Data", 
            paste("Chapter", 1:10),
            rep("Practice", 9))
presenter <- c("Miguez")
sch <- data.frame(dates = dates, topic = topics, presenter = presenter)
kable(sch)
```
